name: Level Up with Skills
author: Palan Yeong
content: In the year 2020, humanity faces a crisis as Earth is attacked by unidentified monsters. Players prepare for the attack by challenging the Labyrinth that appeared. They can choose four options:Easy Mode, where anyone can survive Normal Mode, where you must work to survive Hard Mode, where only 1&#37 could survive and Solo Mode, the harshest difficulty.Kang TaeSan, the strongest Easy Mode player cleared the Labyrinth using an unconventional approach and acquired skills others could not: [ Additio
